articles.description: The actress, 40 - who shares Winston, 14, and Eugene, 10, with her ex - stepped out in thick black trousers, while opting for biker chic style leather boots to complete her monochrome look
articles.content:
Her ex-husband Laurence Fox was slammed by fans after accusing her of using their sons as 'weapons,' in a Twitter rant on Thursday evening.

articles.title: King Charles's artwork sells for nearly 10 times estimate at auction - The Telegraph
articles.description: The print, a pre-production of a painting of Balmoral Castle, sold for £5,737.50 despite being estimated at just £400-600
articles.content:
May Matthews, the managing director of Bonhams, said: "We were quite flabbergasted to see the level of interest in this. We've had interest from all over the globe.
